channel.title: Client dont open tell me why
channel.description:
:: Port: :: 43594 :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_07... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:276) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319) :: Failed! Press any key to continue . . .
Oh yea sometimes it says "java" is not requinized
COME ON PPL PLEASE HELP, I really want a client ... I tried atleast 7 clients..... this is what i did so far....
I download jdk 7 and jre 7
i changed my classpath and path to fit jdk 7
i made a cache folder for a cache508 client
GOD, im really stressing right now please help me

item.title: Client dont open tell me why
item.dc:creator: @harveen harveen
item.description:
@harveen wrote:

dude, i rechecked it and it fits my classpath… And i checked it with the one in the tutorial and there the same…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2008, 10:03:19 pm[/size][hr]Bump!

Read full topic

item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“harveen, post:21, topic:232006”][quote author=Tree link=topic=305618.msg2449235#msg2449235 date=1221881587]

‘JAVA’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

still comes with tat error

Grow a brain and then have a read around.
Should be easy to fix if you have two eyes.
[/quote]

Dude, all i want to play a fricken client… I BEEN LOOKING around everywhere. I dont no wat to do, i have been looking for atleast 5 days now for a sulution… So if u dont want to help and keep making fun of me cuz i dont no what to do… Just leave :([/quote]Set your path’s and learn java, or give up.

item.title: Client dont open tell me why
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“harveen, post:16, topic:232006”][quote author=bigh51 link=topic=305618.msg2449179#msg2449179 date=1221880513]

omg same exact problem i have!!! really pissin me off!!!

Because you’re using a runserver with a runclient. Imbeciles.

NO WE AINT, I DOWNLOADED A CLIENT AND THAT WAS IN THERE!!! AND WHEN U PRESS EDIT ITS LIKE x512m
[/quote]x512m is the amount of memory java uses for it. You are using a server run file for a client. Hence “server” and not “client” in the error. You guys are fucking idiots.

dude its not javac its java i made an error i redid it

@ECHO OFF
TITLE RichScape Client
color 0a
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
PAUSE

thats my run bat[/quote]That should work, also it would be JAVA -Xmx500m server if it was a server run file. Compile both your server and client, then run both of them.

Read full topic
